questions.question: Where do I meet my driver at Brussels Airport (BRU)?
questions.answer: Your chauffeur will be waiting in the Arrivals Hall with a digital name board, typically at the designated "Limousine" meeting point near the Java Coffee House. You'll receive your chauffeur's photo, mobile number, and car plate 24 hours before pickup.

questions.question: Is your fleet compliant with the Brussels LEZ?
questions.answer: Yes. As of 2026, our entire fleet meets or exceeds the latest Low Emission Zone standards. We prioritize Mercedes EQS (Electric) and Euro-6 Hybrid vehicles for full city access. Zero-emission vehicles are available upon request.

questions.question: Do you provide transfers to/from Brussels-Midi station?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in "Train-to-Door" service for Eurostar and Thalys passengers, providing luggage assistance directly from the platform exit. Your chauffeur will meet you at the designated pickup zone.

questions.question: Can we book a transfer to Paris or Amsterdam?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed for cross-border travel within the Schengen area. We provide fixed-rate, long-distance luxury transfers to Paris (CDG & city center), Amsterdam (Schiphol & city center), and Luxembourg. All tolls and fuel included.

questions.question: What happens if my flight to Charleroi (CRL) is delayed?
questions.answer: We track all flights in real-time. Whether your flight is 20 minutes or 3 hours late, your chauffeur will be there upon landing — no extra charges for the first hour of waiting. Our Live Flight Tracking system monitors every inbound flight.

questions.question: Are your drivers trained in diplomatic protocol?
questions.answer: Yes. Our chauffeurs are experienced in handling high-level corporate and diplomatic clientele, ensuring absolute discretion and adherence to security protocols. Many of our drivers regularly serve EU officials, NATO personnel, and diplomatic delegations.

questions.question: How does payment work?
questions.answer: Deposit required upfront (card, bank transfer, or cash), balance due at trip start. We accept: Credit cards (Visa/Mastercard/Amex), Cash (EUR), Bank transfer (Bancontact), Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Corporate accounts with monthly invoicing available.

questions.question: What languages do your drivers speak?
questions.answer: All chauffeurs are fluent in English, French, and Dutch (Flemish). Many also speak German, Russian, Arabic, and additional EU languages. Request your preferred language when booking — no extra charge.
